mapper.select: SELECT userEmail, userNickName, profileOneLiner, profileIntroduce, myPageUrl, commissionStatus, mittingLocation, messageStart, messageEnd FROM profile_user_info WHERE userEmail=#{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile_user_info(userNickName, profileOneLiner, profileIntroduce, myPageUrl, commissionStatus, mittingLocation, messageStart, messageEnd) VALUES (#{userNickName}, #{profileOneLiner}, #{profileIntroduce}, #{myPageUrl}, #{commissionStatus}, #{mittingLocation}, #{messageStart}, #{messageEnd})
